```{r}
library(allocatr)
```

```{r}
## Paramaters
us_equity  <- c("VTI", "VTV", "VOE", "VBR", "VIG")
intl_equity <- c("VEA", "VWO")
us_bonds    <- c("MUB", "VTIP", "LQD", "BND")
intl_bonds <- c("BNDX", "VWOB")
alt_assets <- c("XLE")

symbols <- sort(c(us_equity, intl_equity, us_bonds, intl_equity, alt_assets))

## Load stock prices
prices <- get_prices(symbols, from = "2000-01-01")
save(prices, file = "data/test_prices.RData")

pf <- portfolio(prices = prices)

## Calculate daily returns
rets <- daily_returns(prices)

## Plot cumulative returns
plot_returns(rets)

optimal_portfolio(rets)
```
